Generator methods.
All subgenerators will inherite its methods.

Initialize generator.

objects.comment:
/**
* Helper module for generator and subgenerator.
* Module that hold all hard logic.
* @module helper
*/
objects.description:
Helper module for generator and subgenerator.
Module that hold all hard logic.
objects.name: helper

objects.comment:
/**
* Constructor. Wraps generator instance generated with
* `require('yeoman-generator').Base.extend({})`.
*
* @constructor
* @param generator {yeoman-generator.Base} Generator/subgenerator instance.
*
* @class Helper class which holds most hard logic,
* so that generators/subgenerators methods can be
* as clean as possible.
*
* @type {module.Helper}
*/
objects.description:
Constructor. Wraps generator instance generated with
`require('yeoman-generator').Base.extend({})`.
objects.classdesc:
Helper class which holds most hard logic,
so that generators/subgenerators methods can be
as clean as possible.
objects.name: Helper

objects.comment:
/**
* Constructor. Wraps generator instance generated with
* `require('yeoman-generator').Base.extend({})`.
*
* @constructor
* @param generator {yeoman-generator.Base} Generator/subgenerator instance.
*
* @class Helper class which holds most hard logic,
* so that generators/subgenerators methods can be
* as clean as possible.
*
* @type {module.Helper}
*/
objects.name: module:helper

*/

Main generate method which generate ejs configuration from
`yo-rc.json` file and subgenerator templates.

objects.comment:
/**
* Ask user questions base on provided questions array.
* @param questions {array} Array of questions.
* @param callback {function} Will execute when all the questions will be answered.
* Callback will execute with answered object.
*/

Will execute when all the questions will be answered.
Callback will execute with answered object.
params.name: callback

objects.comment:
/**
* It will create `yo-rc.json` file to destination.
* @param json {object} `yo-rc.json` content.
*/
objects.description: It will create `yo-rc.json` file to destination.
objects.name: createYoRc

objects.comment:
/**
* Get `yo-rc.json` content.
* @param keys {string} If keys is `null` method will return
* whole `yo-rc.json` content. If keys type will be string like `key.anotherKey`, it
* will return key value or undefined.
* @returns {object | string | undefined}
*/
objects.description: Get `yo-rc.json` content.

params.description:
If keys is `null` method will return
whole `yo-rc.json` content. If keys type will be string like `key.anotherKey`, it
will return key value or undefined.
params.name: keys

objects.name: getYoRc

objects.comment:
/**
* Set `yo-rc.json` content.
* @param value {*} Value of key provided in parameters.
* @param keys {string} Example `key.anotherKey`, it will create json if sub key
* don't exist and set child key to value provided in parameters.
*/
objects.description: Set `yo-rc.json` content.

params.description: Value of key provided in parameters.
params.name: value

params.description:
Example `key.anotherKey`, it will create json if sub key
don't exist and set child key to value provided in parameters.
params.name: keys

objects.name: setYoRc

objects.comment:
/**
* Get json value from object.
* @param keyArr {array<string>} Key array example `[key1,key2]`.
* @param json {object} Json object on which value will be searched.
* @returns {object|string} Returns json value example `json[key1][key2]`.
*/
objects.description: Get json value from object.

params.description: Json object on which value will be searched.
params.name: json

objects.name: getJsonValue

objects.comment:
/**
* Sets json value from object.
* @param keyArr {array<string>} Key array example `[key1,key2]`.
* @param json {object} Json object on which value will be searched.
* @param value {*} New value example `json[key1][key2] = value`.
* @returns {object|string} Returns json value example `json[key1][key2]`.
*/
objects.description: Sets json value from object.

params.description: Json object on which value will be searched.
params.name: json

objects.name: setJsonValue
